result.execSummary:
The defendant Lemar C Thomas was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine and costs to be paid at $25.00 per month, commencing 07-01-2016 or serve 21 days jail, consecutive, as penalty for non payment.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

Huber, with standard release conditions including release for work and child care.
Concurrent with: Case 15CM2392
To be performed within 1 year.  To be monitored by WCS.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Lemar C Thomas not in court.  David John Behm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Based on the defendant's non appearance the court issues a capias on 15CM2392. Review hearing on April 9, 2018 at 09:00 am.

with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Lemar C Thomas in court with attorney Amber K. Rumpf.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.    The defendant was sentenced to the following:

Count #1:

HUBER:  30 days, w/Standard Release Conditions including release for work and child care. Defendant to report to Huber facility by 5:00 p.m. on Friday, May 6, 2016.
 (concurrent to 15CM2392)

FINE: $316.00 (to pay $25.00 per month commencing 7/1/16 or serve 21 days jail, consecutive, as penalty for non payment of fine);

DNA SURCHARGE:  $200.00, to be paid at $25.00 per month consecutive to payment of fine.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

COMMUNITY SERVICE: Perform 25 Hours within 1 year.  To be monitored by WCS.
